quotes.quote: Every silver lining has a cloud.
Too many people miss the silver lining because they're expecting gold.
Every cloud has its silver lining but it is sometimes a little difficult to get it to the mint
But you have no silver linings without a cloud.
Every silver lining's got a touch of grey.
Look at the bright side of life and choose to be happy. Yes, it is a matter of choice. When negative thoughts enter your mind, just refuse to look at them, substitute them with happy thoughts.
You got to look on the bright side, even if there ain't one.
Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase. Just take the first step.
If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
Be willing to take the first step, no matter how small it is. Concentrate on the fact that you are willing to learn. Absolute miracles will happen.
Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
When things go wrong, don't go with them.
When you fail, that is when you get closer to success.
Always look on the bright side of life. Otherwise it'll be too dark to read.
Of course I look at the glass half full. The only time I would look at it half empty is when I think about how good the first half tasted.
The average pencil is seven inches long, with just a half-inch eraser   in case you thought optimism was dead.
Nothing is predestined: The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
All misfortune is but a stepping stone to fortune.
Every calamity is a spur and a valuable hint.
There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
Life is a shipwreck but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.
Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not remain so if you only perceive an ideal and strive to reach it. You cannot travel within and stand still without.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment.
The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
A bend in the road is not the end of the road  unless you fail to make the turn.
Birds sing after a storm; why shouldn't people feel as free to delight in whatever remains to them?
